title: Is Uber a technology or transport company? - Quora
tags: Uber Drivers and Driving for Uber

response.answer_text: Uber is both a technology and transportation company. Why? Well, while Uber aims to reshape the transport industry by competing with; Public transportTrucking / LogisticsAnd more!It is it's use of technology that allows it to do so. Automated cars/trucks = lower costs per ride = Uber is very happy with itself. So while Uber is pioneering automation - a technology focussed task - it operates in the transportation industry.
Uber is a transportation company and has no technology other than what was stolen from Google for autonomous cars. The rideshare app is easily duplicated, no useful patents.
